alert.note: Alert for Goshen (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 4:02PM MDT until June 08 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Goshen County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 402 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hawk Springs, or 16 miles south of Torrington, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Torrington, La Grange, Yoder, Huntley, Hawk Springs Campground, Hawk Springs Recreation Area, Veteran and Hawk Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
